metadata.title: Pediatric Laboratory Reference Values
metadata.description: Comprehensive pediatric lab reference ranges from Children's Hospital of Philadelphia
metadata.source: Children's Hospital of Philadelphia, Pathology & Laboratory Medicine Reference Ranges Document
metadata.units: Mixed units as specified per test
metadata.disclaimer: Values are established reference ranges from CHOP clinical laboratory. Patient-specific goals may differ depending on age, sex, clinical condition, and laboratory methodology used. Always consult with a healthcare professional for interpretation of laboratory results.

evaluateValue.description: Function to evaluate if a patient value falls within normal range
evaluateValue.returns: Object with status (normal/low/high/critical), reference range, and interpretation

ageGroupMapping.description: Maps patient age to appropriate reference range category

unitConversion.description: Conversion factors for common lab units
